column4: How do I connect to haskell irc from xchat? I am complete noob, using IRC for the first time. Help.
you need the fqdn then /server irc.haskell.net or .org or .com
whois your domain guesses in a  term to determine if they exist
IANA internet assigned names and numbers assigns those
do i first have to log in on a server, and then join the channel?
the detail is this:    $ irssi -c chat.freenode.net -n myname -w mypassword
do i also need to log in to chat.freenode.net?
